title: Trial: Hold the Cut
summary: Defend a narrow tunnel cut against an onrushing echo pack using Mesh + Anvil Stance.

setup.location: Blackhall lower adit, narrow cut (2m wide, 6m long).

terrain.stones: loose scree, boots slip checks at TN 40 if running

objectives.text: Hold the lane for 3 rounds without enemy breakthrough.

core_checks.name: Rapid_Tangle
core_checks.notes: Action cost = 1; creates 1m difficult terrain for 1 round.

mechanics.ai: Echoes prioritize lowest armor target within 2m of the Mesh unless tangle present.
fail_states: Any enemy exits lane behind defender before round 3 end
Stonewarden drops to 0 HP before round 3 end

failure.text: Foreman grumbles; +1 scene heat in Blackhall for next job.

hooks: Vendor Ansel offers discount on Mesh refit after successful hold.
Blackhall Guard posts a breach contract if hold succeeds cleanly.
